content.html: so I wrote a thing redmonk.com/jgovernor/2022… turns out @awscloud decided it wanted to be included in the post before i hit publish so it made some relevant announcements at #reinvent today. I will be writing more about this
content.value:
so I wrote a thing redmonk.com/jgovernor/2022… turns out 
@awscloud decided it wanted to be included in the post before i hit publish so it made some relevant announcements at #reinvent today. I will be writing more about this

content.html: Great post! I talk about this now and then with my colleagues @getpostman on the Open Technologies team. The push and pull of “meet developers where they are” and “guide developers to where they’re going to be” demands a delicate balance. ⚖️
content.value: Great post! I talk about this now and then with my colleagues @getpostman on the Open Technologies team. The push and pull of “meet developers where they are” and “guide developers to where they’re going to be” demands a delicate balance. ⚖️
